name: Entity Essentials
body: ### Welcome Entity Essentials is a Component-based Entity System written in Java. This framework provides operations and structures to work with entities and components. Apart from that, it provides a couple of useful extras (read more). The current implementation isn't a typical Entity Component System (ECS) known from game development as a part of a game engine. Instead, this framework is designed as foundation for graphical modeling editors.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
